Package ca.ualberta.cs.technologic.Activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptBid
    Activity to Accept a Bid on your item.
    AddComputer
    Allows user to enter all the information on a new computer Press add to at the end to add the computer to the database Will not accept strings in the place of ints
    EditComputerInfo
    Edit the computer the user already owns Will not accept strings in the place of ints
    EditUser
    EditUser is the activity for when the User wants to edit their personal information.
    HomePage
    Homepage where the user can search for computers and view all availbe and bidded on computers Borrowed computers and computers the user owns will not show up here
    LentOut
    Contains a list of all the computers that you currently have lent out to other people
    Login
    Allows the user to login, the user can also create a new account if they dont already have one
    Maps
    Allows the user to enter latitude and longitude and a map pops up
    MyBids
    Shows a list of items that you have bid on you can click on an item and view its details
    MyBorrows
    Contains a list of computers that you are currently borrowing You can also return a computer from this screen
    MyComputers
    Shows a list of computers that you own and their status, availbie bidded or borrowed The user can also add a new computer from this page
    NewUser
    The NewUser class is an activity for creating a new user.
    ReceivedBids
    View the details of a computer and its status You can also click on the owner name and you can view the owner
    ViewComputer  
    ViewUser
    ViewUser allows the User to view other User's personal information.
